homepage_our_process.description: Here at Michaelangelo’s Landscape and Design Group, we specialize in creating spaces where our Atlanta clients sit back and say “I can’t believe how beautiful my space is.” Whether you’re looking for hardscaping, regular turf care, irrigation, pool installation, or commercial landscaping, our full-service landscaping company can make your dreams a reality. Learn more about how we transform spaces with beautiful landscaping and if you’re ready to get started, contact us today.s
